name: amzn-raycast-extension
title: Amzn Raycast Extension
description: Offer a unified interface for convenient access to various internal Amazon services, optimizing workflow efficiency.
author: zhenpewu

commands.name: aws-region
commands.title: AWS Region
commands.description: Search for AWS regions by airport code or region name, delivering comprehensive details such as partition, status, availability zones, and more for each region.

commands.name: billing-central
commands.title: Billing Central
commands.description: Search for accounts from Billing Central by AWS Account ID, Payer Account ID, email, or Customer ID, providing details like account state, account role, and relevant information.

commands.name: isengard
commands.title: Isengard
commands.description: Search for Isengard accounts by ID or Email, allowing seamless federation into the desired account and role, and enabling other valuable actions for enhanced management and control.

preferences.title: Partition
preferences.name: aws-cn
preferences.label: aws-cn
preferences.description: Enable the aws-cn partition. This option requires a VPN connection.

preferences.title: Infer AWS Console Region
preferences.name: infer-console-region-by-airport-code
preferences.label: Airport Code
preferences.description: Enable inferring the AWS region from airport codes found in the email address associated with the AWS account.

preferences.name: infer-console-region-by-region-name
preferences.label: Region Name
preferences.description: Enable inferring the AWS region from region names found in the email address associated with the AWS account.

preferences.name: infer-console-region-by-availability-zone
preferences.label: Availability Zone
preferences.description: Enable inferring the AWS region from Availability Zone IDs found in the email address associated with the AWS account.

preferences.title: Browser
preferences.name: isengard-browser
preferences.description: Select the browser to be used whien federated into the Isengard AWS console.

commands.name: conduit
commands.title: Conduit
commands.description: Search for Conduit accounts by ID or Name, allowing seamless federation into the desired account and role.

preferences.title: Browser
preferences.name: conduit-browser
preferences.description: Select the browser to be used whien federated into the Conduit AWS console.

preferences.title: Session Duration
preferences.name: conduit-session-duration
preferences.description: Specify the session duration for accessing Conduit accounts.

commands.name: code-package
commands.title: Code Package
commands.description: Search for code packages by name, and during launch, favorite, bindle-managed, and recently visited packages are loaded for convenience.

preferences.title: Cache Expiry Duration
preferences.name: cache-expiry-duration
preferences.description: Specify the duration for which an item can remain in the cache without being visited.

commands.name: version-set
commands.title: Version Set
commands.description: Search for version sets and version set groups. Standard mode supports name prefix only, while Preload mode enables approximate name matching for user-related version set groups and recently visited version sets and groups.

preferences.title: Cache Expiry Duration
preferences.name: cache-expiry-duration
preferences.description: Specify the duration for which an item can remain in the cache without being visited.

commands.name: pipeline
commands.title: Pipeline
commands.description: Search for pipelines. Standard mode supports name prefix only, while Preload mode enables approximate name matching for favorite and related pipelines and recently visited pipelines.

preferences.title: Cache Expiry Duration
preferences.name: cache-expiry-duration
preferences.description: Specify the duration for which an item can remain in the cache without being visited.

commands.name: taskei
commands.title: Taskei
commands.description: Perform query on Taskei for Rooms, Sprints, and Tasks along with relevant information.

preferences.name: view-on-sim
preferences.label: View on SIM
preferences.description: Enable viewing sprints and tasks on SIM instead of Taskei.

commands.name: code-review
commands.title: Code Review
commands.description: Retrieve code reviews that are sent by the user and received by the user, as well as sent to favorite permission groups, and provide details such as CR ID, author, description, and the number of approvals, along with any additional relevant information.

commands.name: sim-ticketing
commands.title: Ticketing
commands.description: Perform query on SIM Ticketing (SIM-T) for tickets along with relevant information.

commands.name: phone-tool
commands.title: Phone Tool
commands.description: Search for Amazon employees using Phone Tool, offering comprehensive profiles for each individual.

preferences.title: Cache Expiry Duration
preferences.name: cache-expiry-duration
preferences.description: Specify the duration for which an item can remain in the cache without being visited.

preferences.title: Slack Workspace URL
preferences.name: slack-workspace-url
preferences.description: Specify the Slack workspace URL for direct messaging the Amazon employee; locate it by opening Slack in a web browser.

preferences.title: Slack Workspace ID
preferences.name: slack-workspace-id
preferences.description: Specify the Slack workspace ID for direct messaging the Amazon employee; locate it by opening Slack in a web browser and the workspace ID starts with the letter T.

commands.name: on-call
commands.title: On-Call
commands.description: Search for the current On-Call for Amazon internal teams, providing details like aliases, description, and relevant information.

preferences.name: preload-teams
preferences.title: Preload Teams
preferences.description: Enter a list of On-Call teams that will be preloaded upon execution.

preferences.title: Cache Expiry Duration
preferences.name: cache-expiry-duration
preferences.description: Specify the duration for which an item can remain in the cache without being visited.

commands.name: internal-search
commands.title: Internal Search
commands.description: Perform query on Internal Search, yielding comprehensive and relevant results.

commands.name: quip
commands.title: Quip
commands.description: Search for Quip documents and open them in either the Quip application or browser.

preferences.name: quip-api-token
preferences.title: Quip API Token
preferences.description: Quip personal API access token, which could be obtained by visiting https://quip-amazon.com/dev/token.

commands.name: mwinit
commands.title: Midway Authorization
commands.description: Authorize through Amazon Midway, regularly validate expiration every minute, automatically refresh while promptly updating the status in the subtitle.

preferences.title: mwinit Options
preferences.name: -s
preferences.label: -s
preferences.description: Add sentry cookie for sentry website 'sentry.amazon.com'.

preferences.name: --breakglass
preferences.label: --breakglass
preferences.description: Create ssh certificate to access prod host.

preferences.title: Midway Tasks
preferences.name: kill-exchangesyncd
preferences.description: Force sync Apple Calendar by killing exchangesyncd, automatically executed during user-initiated command.
preferences.label: Kill exchangesyncd

preferences.name: copy-cookie-to-clipboard
preferences.description: Copy the midway cookie file to clipboard for use with Nuke Midway browser extensions.
preferences.label: Copy Midway Cookie to Clipboard

preferences.title: Cloud Desktop Host
preferences.name: cloud-desktop-host
preferences.description: Specify a list of cloud desktop host names, where the local midway cookie and SSH certificate are synced.

commands.name: tiny-url
commands.title: Amazon TinyURL
commands.description: Generate a shortened link with Amazon TinyURL.

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: Customer / merchant ID which needs to be converted.

commands.name: update-extension
commands.title: Update Extension
commands.description: Check and install updates for Amzn Raycast Extension.

preferences.title: Extension Update Method
preferences.name: extension-update-method
preferences.description: Specify the method to update the extension. It is recommended to use the same method as the initial installation for consistency.

commands.name: extension-changelog
commands.title: Extension Changelog
commands.description: List the recent changelogs for Amzn Raycast Extension.
